snippet: Cracking down on the abuses of Americans’ privacy is important enough to pass the USA Freedom Act now, instead of waiting for the next Congress.
abstract: Editorial calls on Senate to break filibuster on the USA Freedom Act; argues privacy is too important an issue to gamble on the next Congress; observes while bill is imperfect, it is a good way to begin restoring individual privacy that has been systematically violated by government spying.
lead_paragraph: Cracking down on the abuses of Americans’ privacy is important enough to pass the USA Freedom Act now, instead of waiting for the next Congress.

headline.main: A Crucial Vote on the Surveillance Bill
